post:
**[NATVPS.NET](https://www.natvps.net)** was started with the purpose of providing quality VPS hosting services at small prices. NATVPS.NET is a legal hosting provider, part of LCSNET.EU. LcS Net was founded in 2007 to provide a wide range of web services to its clients. 

We only use professional equipment that provides increased redundancy and high performance for our customers. HP Proliant Servers, Cisco 100/1000 Mb, EMC Clariion SAN storage with 10,000 and 15,000 RPM disks SCSI / SAS servers connected by a 4Gbps Fibre infrastructure are just some of the components that are part of our infrastructure.

**Features:**

* DDoS protection (Up to 30 Gbps)
* Unmetered 100 Mbps bandwidth
* SolusVM control panel
* Instant activation
* Location: Romania, Timisoara

Test IP: 91.233.106.100
LG: https://www.lcsnet.eu/network-looking-glass

As payment we accept: PayPal, Bitcoin, Credit card (Visa / Mastercard), Bank Transfer

Current conversion rate: 1USD = 0,95EUR

Use Coupon: **NATLET30** on order form to get the 30% recurring discount!


-----------------

**NATed VPS P1**

> * 1 x CPU
> * RAM: 128 MB ECC
> * BURST RAM: 256 MB 
> * HDD: 10 GB SCSI 
> * Bandwidth: 100 Mbps 
> * 1 Shared IPv4 address, 20 TCP & 20 UDP ports

Price: **5.95 Euro** / YEAR 

Order from here: [https://natvps.net/order-nat-vps-p1/](https://natvps.net/order-nat-vps-p1/)


-----------------

Price: **9.10 Euro** / YEAR
 
Order from here: [https://natvps.net/order-nat-vps-p2/](https://natvps.net/order-nat-vps-p2/)

Price: **12.60 Euro** / YEAR 

Order from here: [https://natvps.net/order-nat-vps-p3/](https://natvps.net/order-nat-vps-p3/)

Please note, discount is recurring and will only apply to YEARLY orders, available until **10.01.2017 **
